titles: Proclamation against all meetings of Quakers, Anabaptists, &c.
author: Scotland. Parliament.
notes: Signed and dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the 22. day of January, 1661. and of Our Reign the twelfth year. A. Primerose, Cls. Reg.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 2d 1660"; the second 1 in date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Freedom of religion --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
